name: AWAKENED (itch)
description:
Long awaited...

AWAKENED!

Co-op  puzzle game.  Grab a friend and awaken your inner children...if you dare ;) Sound required (at least for player 1). Playable from the same room or through voice chat.

Developed from scratch for the Nordic Game Jam 2022. Real time spent: ~25h (we all needed sleep unfortunately).

Controls

Player 2 has AAALLL the answers (if you're super curious, check the manual, but we recommend playing through first :) )
